name: Enhanced Emergency Burn
desc: Briefly boost burn level at the cost of fuel and combat readiness. Take reduced damage from hyperspace storms.

name: Enhanced Sustained Burn
desc: Boost burn level at the cost of acceleration and wind-up time. Reduce terrain slow downs.

name: Enhanced Neutrino Detector
desc: Detect in-system entities at very long range; will weed out false readings over time as well as increase in range.

name: Enhanced Remote Survey
desc: Do a preliminary survey on all planets remotely. Detects artificial objects from hyperspace.
